channel.title: Prayer update?
channel.description:
I just logged into rs, and it said i had 360 prayer just like how hp was changed. when was this updated? I am horribly not update on rs. jw and why was it changed is there any benefit to changing it?
btw i searched the web and the runescape KB and found no info on this.

item.title: Prayer update?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:7, topic:416177”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=518119.msg3764602#msg3764602 date=1317149629]
According to a JMod they are working on ‘Summstitution’ next
[/quote]Do you have any more info about this? I’m curious to know what it would be.[/quote]

A friend of mine was in a JMod’s FC the day of the prayer update who was doing Q&A’s on the update. Someone asked if they were going to x10 summoning like they have with prayer and hp and the mod responded with a joke about Summstitution.

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer update?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

Ok thank you all, would have replied sooner but when i tried at first my phone was being stupid, and i just now got to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer update?

[quote=“Phaze One, post:2, topic:416177”]According to a JMod they are working on ‘Summstitution’ next[/quote]Do you have any more info about this? I’m curious to know what it would be.

item.title: Prayer update?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Came out along with Prayer Renewal potion , which is kind of useless imo…

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer update?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

It was added to show a more accurate drain of prayer points, similar to HP/LP. It came out Sept. 6th.

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer update?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

It was added to make players feel better about their prayer level[size=4pt](Not Really).[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer update?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

A new potion was released called the prayer restore potion. An update to prayer was needed for the prayer system for some reason. According to a JMod they are working on ‘Summstitution’ next

Read full topic
